product_name: Maui Jim Maile Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The Maui Jim Maile polarized sunglasses offer a fashion-forward frame and amazing optics for all-day clarity. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV rays from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. MauiGradient lenses feature a darker coating at the top that gets lighter moving down the lense, allowing enough light to filter through in some areas. Dark Tortoise frame features HCL(R) bronze lenses, ideal for variable conditions from sun to overcast. Gloss Black frame features neutral gray lenses, ideal for bright, direct sunlight days. Glass lenses offer amazing optical clarity and are scratch resistant. Lightweight acetate frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely durable. Anti-corrosive spring hinges provide a flexible, secure fit; glasses fit oblong or square face shapes with a medium or narrow bridge. Waterproof and oleophobic coating sheds water and snow and repels grease and smudges. The Maui Jim Maile polarized sunglasses come with a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Maui Jim Maile polarized sunglasses offer a fashion-forward frame and amazing optics for all-day clarity.
